releaseNotes:
## CryptoEdge Pro 1.0.0 - Initial Release

### Features
- AI-powered trading signals (GPT-4 + Claude)
- 3 trading modes: Manual, Semi-Auto, Full-Auto
- Binance integration with OCO orders
- Master password protection (AES-256)
- Multi-language support (EN, DE, ES, FR, ZH)
- Real-time analytics dashboard

### Security
- Military-grade encryption
- 100% local data storage
- No cloud dependencies

### Supported Platforms
- Windows 10+
- macOS 11+

changes: AI trading bot with GPT-4 and Claude
